description:
Ever wondered why Twitter was important? We admit, we did at first too! With over 500,000 new accounts created per day, Twitter can be used as way to:

Find investors and influencers

Learn about people

Find commonality

Demonstrates social savvy

Through a series of screencasts, presentations and pdf's, the INVESTyR DealTeam educates you not only to use Twitter effectively but to utilize it as a means of reaching out to investors, building a rapport, and bringing money into your business.
title: Influence Investors: Secret Twitter Tactics for Fundraising
